acf.heading_title: We help you to Migrate your web-store to Magento from below technologies.
acf.ecommerce_store_title:
How Mage Monkeys Help You
Migrate Your eCommerce Store to Magento?

process_repeater.title: Detailed Analysis
process_repeater.description: We closely work with you to understand your business in order to deliver the right Magento migration suggestions for your eCommerce store. We listen, research, analyze, and document each of your existing store details and customizations. This helps us bring the perfect migration plan for your eCommerce website on the table.

process_repeater.title: Data Migration
process_repeater.description: Once, we are done with the complete analysis of your eCommerce web store, we start working on actual data migration of your existing website to the new and fresh Magento website. For an effective and easy migration of data, we make use of the data migration tool of Magento. For your existing complex customized functionalities, we build the customized solution on Magento that helps you organize the data of your digital commerce store more easily and efficiently.

process_repeater.title: Responsive Design
process_repeater.description: The web store design is the most crucial part of the Magento migration process. There are different design structures for each of the eCommerce suites. So, for your Magento eCommerce store, we have come up with a pixel-perfect website design that will help you offer the same level of amazing user experience across all devices like mobile, tablet, and desktop.

process_repeater.title: Customization, Integrations and Extensions
process_repeater.description: An online store comes with a variety of custom functionalities that differ from industry to industry, business to business. Our team will customize the Magento store to match your requirements. If needed, we integrate or develop highly scalable and robust extensions that help you to manage and maintain your eCommerce web store more accurately.

process_repeater.title: Agile Methodology
process_repeater.description: We work on an Agile methodology that works on migrating your eCommerce website to Magento and testing the same, simultaneously. We will keep you updated throughout the development and testing stages to ensure Magento migration takes place effectively. This helps us to get your constant feedback for any upgrades or changes required.

process_repeater.title: Final Launch
process_repeater.description: As we promise to launch your Magento eCommerce store in no more than 4 weeks, we literally mean it. With your consent and feedback, we finally, launch your newly-made and migrated Magento commerce website. You will be able to improve the customer experience of your store and attract more customers through faster, efficient, and easier Magento migration.

acf.customer_experience_title:
Enhance The Performance Of Your Online Store to
Strengthen the Customer Experience with Magento
acf.customer_experience_description:
The kind of customer experience that an online store offers will decide its success in the digital marketplace. Moreover, only the eCommerce store that offers a good customer experience will be able to generate new and repeating orders.
Magento is the only eCommerce suite that helps you manage your online web store in a way that outperforms your competition, compared to any other eCommerce suite. Hence, Magento has been declared as a “leader” in Gartner’s 2018 Magic Quadrant.
Being a super-flexible platform, Magento lets you customize your entire eCommerce store with ease and innovativeness, in no more than 4 weeks.
acf.way_description: Mage Monkeys offers you a smooth, easy, and speedy transaction from any technology to Magento. We strictly adhere to a no data loss and no downtime policy during the migration process.
